text: 26.22 Luk 24.27, 24.44, Jon 5.46, Lom 3.21 God pen yɨp kod mɨdɨl, mɨd dad amɨl, mɨñɨl kod mɨdeb agak. Ak tek ak, takaw tep nop ak, binɨb yɨb mɨdeb okok sek, binɨb yɨb ma mɨdeb okok sek agñɨlɨg mɨdebin agak. Takaw agñɨbin anɨb ak, adek olap ke mel, bɨ Mosis sek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok sek, kɨli agɨlak tek agñɨbin agak.
